name: Endless Warcade: Endless Climber
description:
ENDLESS WAR dares you to climb it to the top without being knocked off by the eldritch horrors that dwell inside. How many times can you reach it's summit? Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Press the space bar to pause the game. Fullscreen for the best gameplay experience.

Enemy art done by the wonderful citizens of New Los Angeles City aka Neo Milwaukee. You can meet them all here: https://discord.gg/mtSRXek
